channel.title: [562] Alaric
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/1zoat03.jpg[/img]
[b]This project will be for sale on a specific date which will be mentioned closer to the end of this project.[/b][/center]
[center] [IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042726/runescape/images/5/51/Attack-icon.png[/img][B]Attack[/B] [IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042726/runescape/images/5/51/Attack-icon.png[/img] [IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042837/runescape/images/3/3e/Strength-icon.png[/img][B]Strength[/B] [IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042837/runescape/images/3/3e/Strength-icon.png[/img] [IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043012/runescape/images/d/d8/Defence-icon.png[/img][B]Defense[/B] [IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043012/runescape/images/d/d8/Defence-icon.png[/img] [/center]
[ul][li]Fully complex combat system. [/li][li]Includes both Player Vs. Player combat and Player Vs. NPC combat [/li][li]Has attack style switching and special system [/li][/ul]
Media: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PGLTiqUkqBs&feature=player_embedded http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oeWgfJWkg-Q&feature=player_embedded http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6d6rywJSaKg&feature=player_embedded http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tij8CbbGYrg&feature=player_embedded
[center][IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043145/runescape/images/7/72/Ranged-icon.png[/img][B]Range [/B][IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043145/runescape/images/7/72/Ranged-icon.png[/img] [IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043125/runescape/images/7/77/Magic-icon.png[/img][B]Magic [/B][IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043125/runescape/images/7/77/Magic-icon.png[/img][/center]
[ul][li]Includes distance attacks without player movement [/li][li]Magic system has single casting and auto casting with proper graphics, animations, and projectiles [/li][li]Range system include knives, darts, bows. All with proper animations and projectiles [/li][/ul]
[center][IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043246/runescape/images/2/24/Prayer-icon.png[/img][B]Prayer [/B][IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043246/runescape/images/2/24/Prayer-icon.png[/img][/center]
[ul][li]Includes quick prayers, curse prayers, and normal prayers with all of their appropriate effects[/li] [li]Bone burying is not a current feature at this stage of development, look forward to it being a future update[/li][/ul]
[Center][IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042949/runescape/images/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png[/img][B]RuneCrafting [/B][IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042949/runescape/images/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png[/img][/Center]
[ul][li]Runecrafting is a full completed skill at this stage of development[/li] [li]Includes all available altars with the exclusion of blood altar at this given moment[/li] [li]Has exact multiple rune calculations, experience, and everything else compared to Runescape[/li] [li]Basic support for pouches is being developed[/li][/ul]
Media: http://i53.tinypic.com/2qivdvm.png
[Center][IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110427023661/runescape/images/8/83/Hunter-icon.png[/img][B]Hunter [/B][IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110427023661/runescape/images/8/83/Hunter-icon.png[/img][/Center]
[ul][li]Includes a full, simple system for both Box and Snare trapping [/li][li]Has sub system to handle imp catching and soon to be butterfly hunting [/li][li]Current progress is guess to be around 70% of what the skill will be when released [/li][/ul]
Media: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pzLGcsfVw3g&feature=player_embedded
[Center][IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042731/runescape/images/e/e3/Summoning-icon.png[/img][B]Summoning [/B][IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042731/runescape/images/e/e3/Summoning-icon.png[/img][/Center]
[ul][li]Includes summoning following, spawning, and teleporting [/li][li]Has basic system for combat started, but not yet implemented [/li][li]Includes full interface options with appropriate interface configs [/li][/ul]
Media: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uZnq3TgmBjM
[Center][IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043122/runescape/images/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png[/img][B]Fishing [/B][IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043122/runescape/images/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png[/img][/Center] Media: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E_mir_yQj5U&feature=player_embedded#at=113
[Center][IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091230222034/runescape/images/6/6b/Dharok%27s_greataxe.png[/img][B]Barrows [/B][IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091230222034/runescape/images/6/6b/Dharok%27s_greataxe.png[/img][/Center] Media: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_rpZxAdDiH0
Credits:
[ul][li] Dragonkk - Empty Source[/li] [li] Emily - Everything else [/li][/ul]
I'll try to update this when I can remember lol.
Does mopar have spoilers or video embedding...because I literally had to modify every part of my rl thread lol.

item.title: [562] Alaric
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

Sorry Moparscape isn’t a place I come often.

Nazi Penguins base:

I have a few things to fix obviously such as;

  • Sending overall interface then doing config so that the full interface runs through it’s timing ect.
  • NPC aggressive

I have it set so you can change the number of npcs per a given round, and the damage they can inflict. Just for the video so it would go faster I made all rounds consist of 5 penguins + 1 boss at the end. The “11 wave” at the end is because I just make the waves stop after wave 11, when the waves have a system for up to 62 waves of fucking penguins. It handles a different region for each player, ect, ect. It’ll be even more content packed w/ healers ect. & maybe perks idk.

Then random easy shit:

Generating Stealing Creations Map Start:

Read full topic

item.title: [562] Alaric
item.dc:creator: @theham22 theham22
item.description:
@theham22 wrote:

[quote=“Pure Slay, post:13, topic:408958”]@theham the pvp beta will be in a few days, I’m currently delayed due to family members being in the hospital so updates will not continue until after I get this sorted out. As for updates after it is released, I’m going to develop enough content for you to have a decent server. After that it is up to the buyer to make the server their own.

  • Sent from IPhone Via TV[/quote]

Oh ok thanks and I hope your family members get better cya later

item.title: [562] Alaric
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:10, topic:408958”][quote author=Pure Slay link=topic=510241.msg3704744#msg3704744 date=1312952634]

Good luck witht he project. Although, 1 person will buy it and sell it on and keep making copies etc, and then it will eventually be released everywhere.

Your logic is invalid, who would pay $80 for something just to release it? They obviously are going to use it to make money. Also I have 10+ buyers already set up ($800+) So I don’t really care.
[/quote]

Le le le, I want a copy because I is your best friend and you liek to give me stuffz[/quote]

Posted this on rl but didn’t post here, I have started TD but the graphics mask inflicts with the switching mask. Which needs to be fixed.

Added pretty much all foods so that we are reading for the pvp show off beta on friday it’s look like.

Edited Update:
People that are in the top servers that have 562/650+ have been experience people using the new cheat client. Well I have already added protection against it. If you would like to purchase this for your server, message me.

item.title: [562] Alaric
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

[center]

This project will be for sale on a specific date which will be mentioned closer to the end of this project.[/center]

[center] Attack
Strength
Defense [/center]

[ul][li]Fully complex combat system.
[/li][li]Includes both Player Vs. Player combat and Player Vs. NPC combat
[/li][li]Has attack style switching and special system
[/li][/ul]

Media:




[center]Range
Magic [/center]

[ul][li]Includes distance attacks without player movement
[/li][li]Magic system has single casting and auto casting with proper graphics, animations, and projectiles
[/li][li]Range system include knives, darts, bows. All with proper animations and projectiles
[/li][/ul]

[center]Prayer [/center]

[ul][li]Includes quick prayers, curse prayers, and normal prayers with all of their appropriate effects[/li]
[li]Bone burying is not a current feature at this stage of development, look forward to it being a future update[/li][/ul]

[Center]RuneCrafting [/Center]

[ul][li]Runecrafting is a full completed skill at this stage of development[/li]
[li]Includes all available altars with the exclusion of blood altar at this given moment[/li]
[li]Has exact multiple rune calculations, experience, and everything else compared to Runescape[/li]
[li]Basic support for pouches is being developed[/li][/ul]

Media:

[Center]Hunter [/Center]

[ul][li]Includes a full, simple system for both Box and Snare trapping
[/li][li]Has sub system to handle imp catching and soon to be butterfly hunting
[/li][li]Current progress is guess to be around 70% of what the skill will be when released
[/li][/ul]

Media:

[Center]Summoning [/Center]

[ul][li]Includes summoning following, spawning, and teleporting
[/li][li]Has basic system for combat started, but not yet implemented
[/li][li]Includes full interface options with appropriate interface configs
[/li][/ul]
